name: hypso-openmct
description: Open MCT implementation for the HYPSO satellite

scripts.perftest: clinic doctor --on-port="timeout 5 & autocannon localhost:8471 & timeout 5 & autocannon localhost:8471/config & timeout 5 & autocannon localhost:8471/fc/history/uptimeInS?endTime=1604329685571 & timeout 5 & autocannon localhost:8471/fc/history/?endTime=1604329685571 & timeout 5" -- node server/run.js
scripts.dbperftest: echo off & echo Please hit Ctrl + C once MCT Depot has started up. & pause & echo on & move /Y state\db.sqlite3 state\perftest-db-backup.sqlite3 & clinic doctor -- node server/run.js & move /Y state\perftest-db-backup.sqlite3 state\db.sqlite3

author: AudunVN
